DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine time objective biochemical progression response proportion ( objective post-therapy change PSA ) patient hormone refractory metastatic prostate cancer treat docetaxel , estramustine , exisulind . - Determine toxic effect regimen patient . - Determine overall survival patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : Patients receive oral estramustine 3 time daily day 1-5 , docetaxel IV 1 hour day 2 , oral exisulind twice daily day 1-21 . Courses repeat every 21 day absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year .
